titleStmt.title: October 9. 1645. Three letters, concerning his Majesties present condition, one from Generall Pointz, to the Committee of Derby. And the other two from gentlemen of quality, to Mr. William Lilly in London. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Poyntz, Sydenham.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Mathew Simmons for H. B.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
